doctor.name: Dr. Md. Al Mamun Hossain
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Al Mamun Hossain is a Liver Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS (Dhaka), MD (Hepatology). He is a Associate Professor, Hepatology at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Islami Bank Hospital, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Al Mamun Hossain at Islami Bank Hospital, Barisal is 5pm to 8pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Amalendu Bhattacharyya
doctor.info: Dr. Amalendu Bhattacharyya is a Liver Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS, MD (Hepatology). He is a Associate Professor, Hepatology at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Amalendu Bhattacharyya at Popular Diagnostic Center, Barisal is 4pm to 7pm (Closed: Friday).

doctor.name: Dr. Subrata Paul
doctor.specialty: Double FCPS Medicine, Gastroliver & Diabetes Specialist
doctor.info: Dr. Subrata Paul, MBBS, FCPS (Medicine), FCPS (Gastroenterology), MACP (USA), is a highly qualified specialist in medicine, gastroenterology, liver diseases, and diabetes. With a double FCPS in Medicine and Gastroenterology, he provides expert treatment for conditions such as hepatitis, fatty liver, liver cirrhosis, GERD, peptic ulcer, IBS, and diabetes-related complications. He serves as an Assistant Registrar at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. Dr. Subrata Paul is available for consultation at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal (K Jahan Center, House # 106, Sadar Road) from 5 PM to 9 PM every day.

chamber.address: K Jahan Center, House # 106, Sadar Road, Barisal

doctor.name: Dr. Md. Samsul Arafin (Rana)
doctor.info: Dr. Md. Samsul Arafin (Rana) is a Gastro-Liver Specialist in Barisal. His qualification is MBBS (MMC), BCS (HEALTH), MD (HEPATOLOGY)-BSMMU. He is a Consultant, Hepatology at Sher-E-Bangla Medical College & Hospital. He regularly provides treatment to his patients at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal. Practicing hour of Dr. Md. Samsul Arafin (Rana) at Labaid Diagnostic, Barisal is 5pm to 9pm (Closed: Friday).
